title: Tell me about the furniture in your home. What do you have?

korean: 우리 집은 기본적인 가구들로 구성되어 있어.
거실에는 소파랑 TV 거치대, 작은 테이블이 있어.
침실에는 퀸 사이즈 침대랑 작은 협탁이 있어.
책상은 작업실 겸 공부방에 있는데, IKEA에서 산 거야.
의자도 거기서 같이 샀는데, 오래 앉아도 편해.
주방에는 식탁이랑 의자 네 개가 있어.
원래 식탁이 없었는데, 최근에 새로 들였어.
수납공간이 부족해서 선반 몇 개 추가로 샀고.
너무 많은 가구는 공간을 좁게 만드는 것 같아.
english: My home consists of basic furniture.
In the living room, there's a sofa, TV stand, and small table.
The sofa is for two people, and the color is beige.
In the bedroom, there's a queen-size bed and a small nightstand.
The wardrobe is built-in, so I didn't buy it separately.
The desk is in the workspace/study room, and I bought it from IKEA.
I also bought the chair there, and it's comfortable even after sitting for a long time.
In the kitchen, there's a dining table and four chairs.
I originally didn't have a dining table, but I recently got a new one.
Storage space was insufficient, so I bought a few additional shelves.
Overall, I prefer a minimal style.
Too much furniture seems to make the space narrow.
